Module edu.citadel.cvm
Package edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast

Class Program

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.AST
edu.citadel.cvm.assembler.ast.Program
public class Program extends AST
This class implements the abstract syntax tree for an assembly language program.

      Specified by:
      checkConstraints in class AST

    • optimize

      public void optimize()
      Perform code transformations that improve performance. This method is normally called after checkConstraints() and before emit();

    • setAddresses

      public void setAddresses()
      Sets the starting memory address for each instruction and defines label addresses. Note: This method should be called after optimizations have been performed and immediately before code generation.
